entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: obj?.GetType() == typeof(...) is not optimized to method table comparison #108355
    Future

Closed

  • CastCache caches wrong values for IDynamicInterfaceCastable #108229
  • StreamReader.ReadAsync not honoring cancellation token #108342
  • NOWHOT Meia Cassandra mms viral Lea𝚔ed video telegram links #108353
  • System.Private.CoreLib should expose consistent surface area across all OSes #7553

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: use bbID for pred list ordering #108357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold some casts early in importer #108356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] update incorrect references #108352
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix handling of IDynamicInterfaceCastable wrt CastCache #108328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix the QCall contract for GC suppression. #108344
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Convert `ReflectionInvocation.CanValueSpecialCast()` to managed #108305
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: refactor AddCodeDsc #108095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Dispose Xunit ToolCommand #108319
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] fix guid version > 7 #108351
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Warning reported when updating entry point shouldn't be reported for async Main #75286

Closed

  • EnC: Changing the type of an expression around an active foreach statement should be a rude edit #3627
    Backlog
  • EnC: Changing the type of a locked expression should be a rude edit #72240
  • EnC: Report warning when Main method is updated #73472
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use common helper method #75287
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProducesResponseTypeAttribute ContentType Unexpected Behaviour #58140
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext #58139
  • Allow disabling of the Blazor JS Initializers comment in Blazor SSR #58138
  • ProducesResponseTypeAttribute should set content-type for 4xx status codes to application/problem+json #58137
  • MinimalAPI explicit IParsable.TryParse resolution fails on generic custom types #58136
  • PasswordValidator should not throw when password is null #58133
  • Problem details middleware ignores response status code when handling an exception. #58130

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #58135
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58134
  • Perf improvement: https #58119

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ServiceFilterAttribute.cs #58132
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine MapOpenApi_HandlesConcurrentRequests #58129
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Simplifying TFA Validation Logic in MapIdentityApi #57989
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
